Key Match Events: India vs Canada Group A game was washed out due to wet outfield
3 out of the 4 games in Florida have been abandoned due to rain
Post-Match Reflections: Sunil Gavaskar expressed frustration over lack of covers for the entire ground at Central Broward Regional Park Stadium
Gavaskar urged ICC to ensure ICC events are hosted only at venues that have covers for the entire ground
Sanjay Manjrekar highlighted how Sri Lanka handled rain interruptions during the Asia Cup with larger covers
Miscellaneous Highlights: Despite no rain in Lauderhill on Saturday morning, a wet outfield due to overnight showers led to the Group A game getting washed out without a ball bowled
The umpires had two inspections before India's final Group A game was abandoned
USA's game against Ireland on Friday was also washed out due to a wet outfield and rain in Florida
The result ensured USA's progress to the Super 8s while Pakistan were knocked out of the T20 World Cup in the group stage
